sn35.133:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā udāyī kāmaṇḍāyaṃ viharati todeyyassa brāhmaṇassa ambavane.
sn35.133:4.2: Atha kho verahaccānigottāya brāhmaṇiyā antevāsī māṇavako yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.133:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn35.133:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ māṇavakaṃ āyasmā udāyī dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
sn35.133:4.6: Atha kho so māṇavako āyasmatā udāyinā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā yena verahaccānigottā brāhmaṇī tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.133:4.8: “yagghe, bhoti, jāneyyāsi.
sn35.133:4.9: Samaṇo udāyī dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī”ti.
sn35.133:5.1: “Tena hi tvaṃ, māṇavaka, mama vacanena samaṇaṃ udāyiṃ nimantehi svātanāya bhattenā”ti.
sn35.133:5.2: “Evaṃ, bhotī”ti kho so māṇavako verahaccānigottāya brāhmaṇiyā paṭissutvā yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.133:5.4: “adhivāsetu kira, bhavaṃ udāyī amhākaṃ ācariyabhariyāya verahaccānigottāya brāhmaṇiyā svātanāya bhattan”ti.
sn35.133:5.6: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena verahaccānigottāya brāhmaṇiyā nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.133:5.8: Atha kho verahaccānigottā brāhmaṇī āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
sn35.133:5.9: Atha kho verahaccānigottā brāhmaṇī āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ pādukā ārohitvā ucce āsane nisīditvā sīsaṃ oguṇṭhitvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca:
sn35.133:5.11: “Bhavissati, bhagini, samayo”ti vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkami.
sn35.133:6.1: Dutiyampi kho so māṇavako yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.133:6.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn35.133:6.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ māṇavakaṃ āyasmā udāyī dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
sn35.133:6.5: Dutiyampi kho so māṇavako āyasmatā udāyinā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā yena verahaccānigottā brāhmaṇī tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.133:6.8: Samaṇo udāyī dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī”ti.
sn35.133:7.1: “Evamevaṃ pana tvaṃ, māṇavaka, samaṇassa udāyissa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsasi.
sn35.133:7.2: Samaṇo panudāyī ‘bhaṇa, samaṇa, dhamman’ti vutto samāno ‘bhavissati, bhagini, samayo’ti vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkanto”ti.
sn35.133:7.3: “Tathā hi pana tvaṃ, bhoti, pādukā ārohitvā ucce āsane nisīditvā sīsaṃ oguṇṭhitvā etadavoca:
sn35.133:7.6: “Tena hi tvaṃ, māṇavaka, mama vacanena samaṇaṃ udāyiṃ nimantehi svātanāya bhattenā”ti.
sn35.133:7.7: “Evaṃ, bhotī”ti kho so māṇavako verahaccānigottāya brāhmaṇiyā paṭissutvā yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.133:7.9: “adhivāsetu kira bhavaṃ udāyī amhākaṃ ācariyabhariyāya verahaccānigottāya brāhmaṇiyā svātanāya bhattan”ti.
sn35.133:8.1: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena verahaccānigottāya brāhmaṇiyā nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.133:8.3: Atha kho verahaccānigottā brāhmaṇī āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
sn35.133:8.4: Atha kho verahaccānigottā brāhmaṇī āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ pādukā orohitvā nīce āsane nisīditvā sīsaṃ vivaritvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca:
sn35.133:8.5: “kismiṃ nu kho, bhante, sati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ paññapenti, kismiṃ asati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ na paññapentī”ti?
sn35.133:9.1: “Cakkhusmiṃ kho, bhagini, sati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ paññapenti, cakkhusmiṃ asati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ na paññapenti … pe …
sn35.133:9.2: jivhāya sati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ paññapenti, jivhāya asati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ na paññapenti … pe ….
sn35.133:9.3: Manasmiṃ sati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ paññapenti, manasmiṃ asati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ na paññapentī”ti.
sn35.133:10.1: Evaṃ vutte, verahaccānigottā brāhmaṇī āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca:
sn35.133:10.3: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
sn35.133:10.5: evamevaṃ ayyena udāyinā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn35.133:10.6: Esāhaṃ, ayya udāyi, taṃ bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammañca, bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn35.133:10.7: Upāsikaṃ maṃ ayyo udāyī dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
